alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Carlton; Cass; Crow Wing; Itasca; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 5:05AM CDT until May 30 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Itasca County in north central Minnesota... Aitkin County in east central Minnesota... Cass County in north central Minnesota... Northwestern Pine County in east central Minnesota... Western Carlton County in northeastern Minnesota... Crow Wing County in east central Minnesota... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 505 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Motley, to 7 miles southeast of South Long Lake, to near Bock, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Upper South Long Lake and South Long Lake around 510 AM CDT. Garrison around 515 AM CDT. Deerwood around 520 AM CDT. Pequot Lakes and Pine River around 525 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Aitkin, McGrath, Wabedo, Palisade, Woman Lake and Longville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Aitkin; Carlton; Cass; Crow Wing; Itasca; Pine
